titles.title: National STEM Education Tax Incentive for Teachers Act of 2009
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage teachers to pursue teaching science, technology, engineering, and math subjects to elementary and secondary schools.
National STEM Education Tax Incentive for Teachers Act of 2009

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: National STEM Education Tax Incentive for Teachers Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain full-time elementary and secondary school teachers of math, science, engineering, or technology courses a refundable tax credit for 10% of their undergraduate tuition up to $1,000 in any taxable year. Increases such credit amount to $1,500 for teachers in schools serving disadvantaged children.
